title: DG FIA, NADRA Chairman discuss Strategic Cooperation and Digital Reforms
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 09 (APP):Director General of the Federal Investigation Agency (FIA) Rifaat Mukhtar met with NADRA Chairman Lieutenant General Munir Afsar at the FIA Headquarters in Islamabad.
During the meeting, the two sides discussed enhancing strategic cooperation, improving digital systems, and strengthening collaboration between the two institutions. Both leaders emphasized the importance of closer coordination to tackle emerging challenges effectively.
At the conclusion of the meeting, commemorative shields were exchanged as a gesture of mutual respect and commitment to ongoing partnership.
